name: Gridtype
tagline: Continue the conversation, Get the critiques you want.
body:
## Student Features
* Upload / Sort Work
* Rate Work
* Leave Critiques for Others
* Add Iterations to Uploaded Works
* Faculty Features

## Create Groups / Albums
* Rate / Comment on Work
* Generate Department Analytics
* Support

## Who's Behind GRIDTYPE?
* Forum
* Feature Request
* Bug Report
* Release Log

## Screenshots

![All Projects](http://www.projectgridtype.org/images/caps/7.png)
![Single Piece with Rating](http://www.projectgridtype.org/images/caps/9.png)
